value.label: Customer
value.description: Individuals or organizations that purchase goods or services from the company.

value.label: Supplier or Vendor
value.description: Individuals or companies that provide goods or services to the company.

value.label: Employee
value.description: Individuals employed by the company, including full-time, part-time, and contract workers.

value.label: Prospect or Lead
value.description: Individuals or organizations that have shown interest in the company's products or services but haven't made a purchase yet.

value.label: Partner or Affiliate
value.description: Other businesses or organizations that collaborate with the company in various capacities, such as distribution partners, resellers, or strategic alliances.

value.label: Government Agency
value.description: Contacts related to regulatory bodies, tax authorities, or other government entities that the company interacts with for compliance purposes.

value.label: Marketing or PR Contact
value.description: Individuals or organizations involved in marketing campaigns, public relations activities, or media relations.

value.label: Internal Contact
value.description: Contacts within the organization who are not necessarily customers or suppliers, such as department heads, managers, or colleagues.

value.label: Service Provider
value.description: Individuals or companies that provide specialized services to the company, such as IT support, consulting services, or maintenance contracts.

value.label: Contractor or Freelancer
value.description: Individuals or companies hired on a temporary or project basis to perform specific tasks or services for the company.
